name: Void Rain
tooltip: Envelops an area with acidic rain, dealing <d ref="duckiesVoidRainBoss_DamageRadius.amount/duckiesVoidRainBoss_Persistent.periodic.durations[0]" style="Red"/> damage per second to enemies in it. Persists for <d ref="duckiesVoidRainBoss_Persistent.periodic.count*duckiesVoidRainBoss_Persistent.periodic.durations[0]"/> seconds.
